title: (x) Hello magazine font - Futura {Chesh}
content: Could anyone advise me as to the font used by Hello! please? the Z is very distinctive. Thank you! Andie ![hello sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20111223093218im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/35818.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content: Too late and and wrong to boot. I guessed Gill Sans Extra Bold that was compressed but the M is wrong. Nothing to see here. Keep it moving ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20111223093218im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
